title: Is there a new Twilight book coming out in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Its already been released (august 4, 2020 in the USA) its called Midnight Sun. I love the Twilight series but this might be the worst book I have ever read. It’s 650 pages of someone wresting internally with himself. It is SO slow and spends far too much time simply talking in circles. I am the kind to read a book every two weeks or so (I also have a toddler to take care of so I don't spend a lot of time reading), if its something I am really into it can take a few days to a week….this had taken me almost two months to slog through and I still have 200 pages left! I would highly recommend skipping this one.
it already came out, i forgot what it’s called tho. it’s in edwards point of view of the first book.
